Customizable Luggage Tag: Allow users to personalize their luggage tags with their name, initials, and favorite quote or image to make it unique and memorable.
Smart Luggage Tag: Develop a luggage tag that tracks the location of the luggage in real-time using GPS technology.
Luggage Tag with Built-in Charger: Create a luggage tag with a built-in portable charger that can charge smartphones and other devices on the go.
Luggage Tag with Multi-language Translation: Develop a luggage tag that can translate different languages, making it easier for travelers to communicate with locals.
Luggage Tag with RFID Technology: Create a luggage tag with RFID technology that can be scanned by airlines and hotels for easy check-in and identification.
